channel.title: [pi] hand cannon problem please help
channel.description:
Please remove if its in wrong section.
I have been having trouble with hand cannon on my server latly and i tryed lots of stuff and is wondering if u guys could help. When i weild it it only goes in weapon spot and leaves the shield there. So whe nu wear it u have a hand cannon and shield and it is supposed 2 be only a hand cannon not shield. And when u go and attack a monster it hits like a whip. I need help with this really badly so please comment and tell me how to fix thanks. Item.cfg item = 15241 Hand_cannon A_miniature_dwarven_cannon. 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 90 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
if u need anymore things ill post back up. thanks

item.title: [pi] hand cannon problem please help
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

combatassistant.java i think for the anim’s or itemassistant.java, one of those, just search like “block” and youll see block emotes. idk about cannon balls tho

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] hand cannon problem please help
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

again look up a bow sequence so look up like magic bow id or a bow id and then keep going til you see something where it looks like arrow ids are involved, then make a duplicate and put the codes of hand cannon and hand cannon balls. Simple eh? and u asked for the animations so i gave u a tut, not my fault. Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] hand cannon problem please help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

In the ItemAssistant class, add the hand cannon to this method:

I haven’t looked at PI enough to know where weapon animations are handled, but try and find that. Then just add a new statement to make a new animation.

Probably something like startAnimation(#); where ever your method for attacking NPCs is.

Read full topic
